Services

Studio Lagier focuses on all areas of a project's life-cycle. We're passionate about building Javascript applications and bringing ambitious ideas to life.

Full-stack Javascript appsLanding pagesAdmin interfacesSchema designFrontend performance tuningReal-time infrastructureData visualizationArchitecture auditsAnalytics and logging solutions

Our past work

StackInfluence database migration

Working with the team at StackInfluence, we migrated their MongoDB database to a new PostgreSQL instance. We ensured that service was not disrupted, the database performed above expectations, and there were stability guarantees that will allow their business to scale.

Check them out

Scalero email ingest

We performed several services for the folks at Scalero. We sanitized and secured a WordPress install after a security breach and moved them to a properly-scaled service on AWS. We also worked to help them ingest thousands of new email templates and hundreds of thousands of existing variables from a large new client of theirs - our script did in an hour what would have taken them weeks by hand.

Take a peek

HeapViz memory leak detection tool

We built the HeapViz tool from the ground up. HeapViz is a visualization engine for Chrome memory profiles. You can follow our development through our blog posts. Chrome heap profiles are very large, and we needed to use all of the performance-enhancing tools at our disposal to effectively render them, including WebGL, WebAssembly, and WebWorkers. It now powers a portion of the PM2 memory profiler.

Try it now

LinkBee smartbulb landing page

LinkBee was a collaboration with the talented designers at StudioGood, to build a fresh, bright, dynamic site for the upcoming launch of a smart lightbulb startup. The level of interactivity brought an exciting product to life.

Take a look

Aldi blog refresh

This was another collaboration with the designers at StudioGood, to launch an exciting rebrand of their blog alongside an interactive recipes campaign to promote ALDI products. The overall result was a pretty page and some fun SVG graphics that looked great across all devices and browsers.

See our work

Who are we?

Hi! I'm Tom - my wife Mary and our dog Bandit are the team behind Studio Lagier. I used to work at Google, Mary was at Reflektive, and before that we worked at several startups, digital, and creative agencies. Combined we have almost two decades of full-stack development experience.

We're in sunny San Luis Obispo, California - when we're not working on client projects, you can catch us hiking, surfing, or just enjoying the view.
